column5: I found a good amount of fishing equipment today at a boat launch. It was in the Lake Simcoe area and is of substantial value. Please discribe what you left at the launch and it all be returned.  Tom
Now theres honesty for ya.Ill keep my ears open for ya.
Well, it was in a tackle thingy, and there was some hooks, and some lures, and some sinkers too.....izat close enough?
Good for you!!! wish the guy that found my rod/tackel bag this winter on simcoe was as honest as you.
Good stuff, T Fisher. You're paying it forward. Someone taught you well in your younger years. I'm glad that you're part of our community.
yep ....some real classy dudes on this site...good on ya

It was a assortment of fishing equipment with lots of hooks and things........do you need a address to send said things.....let's make this easier on both of us...just send a $100 check to me and you keep the difference...PM me for my address...
Very good of you to try and locate the owner T Fisher.
Good on ya for trying to find the person. I hope the "fishing God's" return the favour to you.
It's been said that angling is a Gentlemans passtime.. You're proving that. Cheers!
Did you check the port-0'-potty..........they may have just been tending to an "emergency"    lol
I think Chris Hiltz should be commended for returning the equipment Tom.
The sad part is you couldn't even leave it at the nearest store or bait shop and expect the owner to get it back.  Maybe post a note somewhere in the area
good on ya!   PB's are sure to come your way!  Cheers.

Good on you!!! Too many people would just grab everything and RUN! The fishing gods will smile on you and you can look at yourself in the mirror and say you did something good for someone you don't even know. The guy that grabs and runs needs to look over his shoulder when he looks in the mirror.

Hey GB maybe you should ask B-4 you post a remark. Chris and I were fishing together the founder was me not Chris. I told him to post the find on the other board and I would post on this board.  PM SENT.
